verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
So precious is Jesus
My Savior my King
His praise all the day long
With rapture I sing
To Him in my weakness
For strength I can cling
For
He is so precious to me

verse.lines:

For

For

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He stood at my heart's door
'mid sunshine and rain
And patiently waited
An entrance to gain
What shame that so long
He entreated in vain
For
He is so precious to me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I stand on the mountain
Of blessing at last
No cloud in the heavens
A shadow to cast
His smile is upon me
The valley is past
For
He is so precious to me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I praise Him because
He appointed a place
Where some day through faith
In His wonderful grace
I know I shall see Him
Shall look on His face
For
He is so precious to me
